name: Outlook.com remove ads on the right side
description: Just does what the title says. Works also for people already using an adblocker to remove that ad message. Also check out https://userstyles.org/styles/172958 to remove the ad on the bottom left.

user.name: TomONeill
user.about: I make themes for websites and you are free to edit them.

additional_info:
Changelog:
v3.3
Fix latest OWA update + removed some CSS that got obsolete.

v3.2.2
Yay, another OWA update which changed the CSS class again.

v3.2.1
Fix for latest OWA update.

v3.2
Update for the updated UI. This fix most likely breaks whenever Microsoft updates Outlook again, which is probably really soon.

v3.1
Removed the extra feature. I decided this style should just do what the title says.

v3.0
Added support for outlook.live.com/owa.
+ Extra feature: shows "select all" checkbox by default (instead of on hover).

v2.0:
Won't hide the page numbers with this new piece of code.

v1.1:
Better support.

v1.0:
First release

discussions.name: Hides the scrollbar in mailboxes on Firefox
